nert: An API Client for TERN Data

Source: R/nert-package.R
nert-package.Rd

Provides access to Australia's TERN (Terrestrial Ecosystem Research Network) data through the API, https://tern.org.au.

Author

Maintainer: Adam H. Sparks adamhsparks@gmail.com (ORCID)
